metadata.title: CVE-2018-20761 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
GPAC version 0.7.1 and earlier has a Buffer Overflow vulnerability in thegf_sm_load_init function in scene_manager.c in libgpac_static.a.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20761` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gpac - 0.5.2-426-gc5ad4e4+dfsg5-3ubuntu0.1
gpac-modules-base - 0.5.2-426-gc5ad4e4+dfsg5-3ubuntu0.1
libgpac4 - 0.5.2-426-gc5ad4e4+dfsg5-3ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gpac package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.5.2-426-gc5ad4e4+dfsg5-3ubuntu0.1').
